item.title: Contact
item.description: Follow me on these social media platforms: Platform URL YouTube: http://www.youtube.com This is an example of a custom shortcode that you can put right into your content. You will need to add a form action to the the shortcode to make it work. Check out Formspree for a simple, free form service. Your Name Email Address An email address is required.
